pasta.name: Spaghetti All Vongole
pasta.comment: Amazing, the muscles were the perfect touch!

pasta.name: Pappardelle Ai Funghi
pasta.comment: Mushrooms and egg yolk was exactly what this dish needed!

pasta.name: Tagliolini Al Rags Bianco
pasta.comment: The zucchini was not me fav!

pasta.name: Mezzi Rigatoni Al Ragu
pasta.comment: Huge fan of bolognese, was my favorite dish!

pasta.name: Tonnarelli Cacio e Pepe
pasta.comment: The cheese fondue sauce with black pepper was perfect!
